messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
Yes
Can you introduce yourself ?
It's there in my resume.
Please stay focused on the interview.
Hi, I am Hriday, I did my engineering in Mechanical Engineering and am an aspiring software engineer.
Nice, Hriday. Moving on to the next question, could you tell me about your project on food delivery website?
I built it using MERN stack.
Okay,Can you elaborate more?
I built it using MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReacJS and NodeJS
Can you elaborate more?
What all should I mention?
You could tell me more about what did the application do and how the various features were implemented.
It is a application that allows to order food.
Okay, can you elaborate more on this?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday.This question is being skipped. Could you tell me more about how you integrated the front end with the back end?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. Could you tell me why you used React and not something more modern like Svelte or Vue?

I used react because of it's sheer popularity and the availibilty of additional libraries.Another reason for React as my choice was because of the vast variety of tutorials available for almost anything.
Interesting, Hriday.Moving on to the next question, Can you tell me about your experience at Prodigy InfoTech?
I was a web development intern at prodigy infotech.
Can you elaborate more?
I worked as a frontend engineer to ref the ui/ux of the application and help to make the code more modular.
Good to know that, Hriday. Could you tell me more about how you made the code more modular at Prodigy InfoTech?
I used more recent Javasript frameworks like Next.js to make the code more modular and robust.
Amazing, Hriday. What changes did you make in the UI/ UX of the application while working at Prodigy InfoTech?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Hriday. This question is being skipped. I can see that you've mentioned MERN stack as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
Yes, I'm proficient in Mongo DB, Express JS, React and Node JS. I've used it in my projects that you asked about.
Nice, Hriday. Could you tell me about keys in React?
A key is a special string attribute that needs to be included when using lists of elements.
Nice, Hriday. Moving on to the next question. What is JSX?
JSX stands for JavaScript XML. It allows us to write HTML inside JavaScript and place them in the DOM without using functions like appendChild() or createElement().
Great, Hriday.Thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
